{{Infobox/Jutsu |ref=''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 251 |image=Heavenly Foot Of Pain2.png |kanji=痛天脚 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Tsūtenkyaku |literal english=Heavenly Foot of Pain |english tv=Heaven Kick of Pain |game names=Legendary Heel Drop
Painful Sky Leg |parent jutsu=Chakra Enhanced Strength |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Taijutsu |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short |users=Tsunade, Sakura Haruno~movie |debut manga=163 |boruto=No |sasuke retsuden=No |konoha shinden=No |blue vortex=No |debut anime=93 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2 |movie debut=Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game, Movie }} [[Tsunade]] leaps into the air and concentrates all her strength into her heel. She then rapidly swings her heel down, not only doing severe damage to anyone she hits, but also cratering the ground and decimating the surrounding structures. As with all Tsunade's extreme feats of strength, this technique is possible because of her excellent [[chakra]] control. == Trivia == * In ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3]]'', some characters can be customised to use this technique. == See Also == * [[Cherry Blossom Impact]] * [[Guillotine Drop]] * [[Leaf Drop]] == References == [[es:Patada Voladora del Cielo]] [[fr:Coup de Talon Légendaire]] [[pl:Tsūtenkyaku]] [[pt-br:Pé da Dor Celestial]]
